page.title: 02Landscape-Witton &Ridlington
page.content: Area near the coast is very flat becoming slightly undulating inland.Therefore,outstanding features like pylons on Bacton Gas Site,water tower & Lighthouse at Happisburgh can be seen over most of the area;also many church towers. In N.E. of area trees are badly bent due to prevailing salty winds. {Roads & Trees}Older lanes are winding with banks either side often topped by hedges. Newer roads sometimes have side grass verges & there are small groups of trees in corners of fields & small plantations. {Commons}There are 2 small commons which are not grazed so growth is scrubby with beautiful display of gorse in the spring. {Coastline}Very small area of coastline consisting of a seawall & a smooth sandy beach divided by groynes.
